page.title: 14Law and Order
page.content:
Law and Order
Law and order is not much of a problem in the block and is limited mainly to minor acts of vandalism and domestic disputes. The representative of law being a constable, living out side the area, occasionally assisted by a woman P.C. The constable uses a small car to cover the area. One of his tasks is giving talks to children at tje school, and also assisting with the cycling proficiency tests. The most evidenc of police in the area is due to road traffic accidents on the main A49 trunk road.
